name: Gen 1 | Sphynx, Rare, CatLord
bio: Ugh! I'm Gen 1 | Sphynx, Rare, CatLord. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. Can you make my tantalizing dreams come true?
